item.title: Google 播客將關閉，提醒用户遷移數據
item.description:
軟餐收到了 Google 郵件通知，該公司再次提醒即將停止 Google 播客服務，並建議用户將已訂閲的播客遷至 YouTube Music 或下載到本地。Google 在郵件中寫道：

謹在此提醒您，2024 年 4 月 2 日之後，您無法再在 Google 播客中收聽播客了。在 2024 年 7 月 29 日之前，您仍然可以將訂閲的播客節目遷移到 YouTube Music，或者將訂閲的節目下載到本地，然後上傳到支持導入該文件的應用中。

若要使用遷移和導出工具，您需要使用最新版本的 Google 搜索和 Google 播客應用，並擁有有效的賬號類型。如果您使用的是不受支持的應用版本，那麼只能針對網頁版 Google 播客使用遷移和導出工具。

Google 於去年 9 月宣佈將關閉播客應用程序 Google Podcasts，播客功能將由 YouTube Music 承接。

We have received a notification email from Google informing us once again that they will be discontinuing the Google Podcasts service. They advised users to migrate their subscribed podcasts to YouTube Music or download them locally. In the email, Google stated:

We would like to remind you that starting from April 2, 2024, you will no longer be able to listen to podcasts on Google Podcasts. Until July 29, 2024, you can still migrate your subscribed podcast programs to YouTube Music or download the subscribed episodes locally and then upload them to an app that supports importing such files.

To use the migration and export tools, you will need to have the latest versions of Google Search and Google Podcasts applications and have a valid account type. If you are using an unsupported app version, you can only use the migration and export tools for the web version of Google Podcasts.

Google announced in September of last year that they would be shutting down the Google Podcasts application, and the podcast functionality would be taken over by YouTube Music.

item.title: 美國司法部宣佈對蘋果提起全面反壟斷訴訟
item.description:
美國司法部當地時間 3 月 21 日宣佈對蘋果公司提起全面反壟斷訴訟，指控該公司在智能手機領域非法壟斷，排擠競爭對手並扼殺創新。對此，蘋果公司稱該訴訟 「在事實和法律上都是錯誤的」，並稱將積極應對。美國司法部長 Merrick Garland 表示，蘋果公司在智能手機市場擁有壟斷權；蘋果通過排他性行為維持自己的市場壟斷能力。

The U.S. Department of Justice announced on March 21st that it is filing a comprehensive antitrust lawsuit against Apple Inc., accusing the company of engaging in illegal monopolistic practices and stifling competition in the smartphone industry. Apple has responded by stating that the lawsuit is 「wrong on the facts and the law」 and that it will actively defend itself. U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland has stated that Apple holds a monopoly in the smartphone market and maintains its market dominance through exclusionary conduct.

item.title: 3 月安全更新能讓 Windows Server 崩潰
item.description:
微軟表示，在安裝了 2024 年 3 月的安全更新 (KB5035857) 後，會導致 Windows Server 出現死機問題。由於這個內存問題，服務器會意外重啓或卡住。該 bug 存在於所有現代版本的軟件中。受影響的版本包括 Windows Server 2012 R2、2016、2019 和 2022。微軟表示正在努力修復這個問題。上週，在安裝更新後，一些系統管理員在線投訴服務器操作系統出現問題。微軟介紹，如果在域控制器上安裝了 Windows Server，並且同時使用本地安全性子系統服務（Local Security Authority Subsystem Service）或 Lsass 和基於雲的 Active Directory 的本地域控制器通過 Kerberos 進行身份驗證請求，可能會發生內存泄漏。由於 「極端的內存泄漏」，Lsass 可能會崩潰。微軟表示，這會導致域控制器重新啓動，儘管許多管理員報告稱域控制器也會卡住。微軟表示已經找到了主要原因，但對此並未提供更多細節。公司寫道：「我們正在研究解決方案，並將在未來幾天內提供。」

Microsoft has stated that installing the security update (KB5035857) for March 2024 can cause Windows Server to experience freezing issues. Due to this memory problem, servers may unexpectedly restart or become stuck. This bug exists in all modern versions of the software. The affected versions include Windows Server 2012 R2, 2016, 2019, and 2022. Microsoft is actively working to fix this problem. Last week, after installing the update, some system administrators complained online about issues with the server operating system. Microsoft explains that if Windows Server is installed on a domain controller and both the Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (Lsass) and cloud-based Active Directory are used for Kerberos authentication requests, a memory leak may occur. Due to an 「extreme memory leak,」 Lsass may crash. Microsoft states that this leads to the domain controller restarting, although many administrators have reported that the domain controllers also become stuck. Microsoft claims to have identified the primary cause but has not provided further details. The company writes, 「We are investigating a solution and will provide it in the coming days.」

item.title: GitHub 推出可自動改 Bug 的 AI 工具
item.description:
GitHub 發佈了一款新的 AI 工具，可以自動修復代碼中的漏洞。名為 code scanning autofix 的工具的公開測試版已向所有 GitHub Advanced Security 用户開放。GitHub 長期以來一直使用名為 CodeQl 的工具自動掃描存儲庫以查找潛在的安全問題。該引擎現在與 GitHub Copilot API 結合使用，不僅可以自動查找漏洞，還可以建議開發人員如何修復發現的漏洞。代碼掃描自動修復還提供了所提出建議的解釋。有關如何修復錯誤的建議不限於單個文件，還可以包括對多個文件的更改。它還可能包含需要添加到項目中的依賴項。 GitHub 在一份公告中解釋説，開發人員可以接受、修改或拒絕建議。

code scanning autofix 現在可以處理 JavaScript、Typescript、Java 和 Python 90% 以上的警報類型。該公司還表示，該系統可以修復超過三分之二的已發現錯誤，而開發人員自己幾乎不需要進行任何調整。稍後將支持更多語言，首先會添加 C# 和 Go。

參考：https://github.blog/2024-03-20-found-means-fixed-introducing-code-scanning-autofix-powered-by-github-copilot-and-codeql/

GitHub has released a new AI tool that can automatically fix vulnerabilities in code. The tool, called code scanning autofix, has been made available in a public beta to all GitHub Advanced Security users. GitHub has long used a tool called CodeQL to automatically scan repositories for potential security issues. The engine now integrates with the GitHub Copilot API, allowing it not only to identify vulnerabilities automatically but also to suggest how developers can fix the discovered issues. The code scanning autofix also provides explanations for the proposed fixes. The suggested fixes are not limited to individual files and can include changes across multiple files. It may also include dependencies that need to be added to the project. According to GitHub’s announcement, developers have the option to accept, modify, or reject the suggestions.

Currently, code scanning autofix can handle over 90% of alert types for JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, and Python. The company also stated that the system can fix over two-thirds of the identified errors with minimal adjustments required from developers. Support for additional languages will be added later, with C# and Go being the first to be included.

item.title: Epic Games 年內發佈安卓版和 iOS 版遊戲商店
item.description:
在 State of Unreal 2024 演示期間，Epic Games 表示，正在開發適用於 Android 和 iOS 的 Epic Games Store 移動版本，並稱會在 2024 年底發佈。圍繞該應用商店，Epic Games 與幾家合作伙伴達成了合作，但官方沒提及具體名單。Epic Games 在今年年初宣佈要發佈 iOS 版移動應用商店。自 3 月初以來，隨着 DMA 的生效，歐盟用户已能夠在 iOS 17.4 上安裝替代的 iOS 應用商店。

During the State of Unreal 2024 presentation, Epic Games announced that they are developing a mobile version of the Epic Games Store for Android and iOS, with plans to release it by the end of 2024. Epic Games has collaborated with several partners for the development of this app store, although the specific names were not mentioned officially. Earlier this year, Epic Games announced their intention to launch an iOS version of the mobile app store. Since early March, with the implementation of DMA, European Union users have been able to install alternative iOS app stores on iOS 17.4.
